content: MAI Anh Tien | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS MAI Anh Tien Full-time Faculty Assistant Professor of Information Systems; Lee Kong Chian Fellow Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of Montreal, 2016 Teaching Topics Web Application Development Optimization and Intelligent Decision Systems Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to BUI The Viet HOANG Minh Huy PHAM Hoang Giang TRAN Huy Hung +65 68264806 atmai@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceDecision Making & OptimizationLearning & WorkAnalytics & Decision SupportUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentUrban Logistics & Sustainability Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
